message.content: {"given_definition_quality":45,"better_definition":"to understand; to know clearly","sentence":"我明白。","image_prompt":"A young person stands in a gently lit room, their face expressing a moment of realization and understanding. Animation style, with calm, warm colors emphasizing clarity and relief.","sentence_translation":"I understand."}
